actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Bankhead-Jones Farm Tenant Act to increase the amount of any loan for which funds may be appropriated without prior approval of such loan by the appropriate committees.

summary.text: Increases from $250,000 to $1,000,000 the Farmers Home Administration loan limitations for loans made under the Bankhead-Jones Farm Tenant Act for resource conservation and development projects conducted with the assistance of the Soil Conservation Service.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Bankhead-Jones Farm Tenant Act to increase the amount of any loan for which funds may be appropriated without prior approval of such loan by the appropriate committees.
